body:
This is a pre-production compiler. However, I am trying to take advantage of Spack.
So, I attempted to add it, and it did not work.
I tried it on installing Metis and failed as shown below. (Some of the characters are not correctly shown due to board limitations)
```
$ spack install metis %clang-gpu
==> Installing metis
==> Installing cmake
==> Installing ncurses
==> Using cached archive: /....../spack/var/spack/cache/ncurses/ncurses-6.0.tar.gz
==> Already staged ncurses-6.0-dmh6crdnvfnmxbdohokizawx35dtixvw in /....../spack/var/spack/stage/ncurses-6.0-dmh6crdnvfnmxbdohokizawx35dtixvw
==> Already patched ncurses
==> Building ncurses [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase : 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase : 'configure'
==> Executing phase : 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j160'
/....../spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:275, in build:
     270      def build(self, spec, prefix):
     271          """Makes the build targets specified by
     272          :py:attr:``~.AutotoolsPackage.build_targets``
     273          """
     274          with working_dir(self.build_directory):
  >> 275              inspect.getmodule(self).make(*self.build_targets)

See build log for details:
/var/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-3H_y8m/ncurses-6.0/spack-build.out
```
=========================================================
The last couple of lines in the file above contains the following
```
/var/tmp/.../ncurses-93ee4e.o: In function `wide_show_attr':
/var/tmp/.../ncurses-74fc3b.bc:(.text+0xefcc): undefined reference to `wattr_get'
clang-3.8: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[1]: *** [Makefile:359: ncurses] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/var/tmp/.../spack-stage/spack-stage-3H_y8m/ncurses-6.0/test'
make: *** [Makefile:120: all] Error 2
```
========================================================
Here are the changes I made

1. modified two lines in `lib/spack/env/cc` as below:

from `cc|c89|c99|gcc|clang|icc|pgcc|xlc|xlc_r)`
to  `cc|c89|c99|gcc|clang|icc|pgcc|xlc|xlc_r|clang-gpu)`

from  `c++|CC|g++|clang++|icpc|pgc++|xlc++|xlc++_r)`
to  `c++|CC|g++|clang++|icpc|pgc++|xlc++|xlc++_r|clang++-gpu)`

2. Added a directory `spack/lib/spack/env/clang-gpu`
    and created symbolic links under the directory
```
    clang++-gpu -> ../cc
    clang-gpu -> ../cc
    f77 -> ../cc
    f90 -> ../cc
    f95 -> ../cc
    fc -> ../cc
    gfortran -> ../cc
```
3. Copied `lib/spack/spack/compilers/clang.py` to `lib/spack/spack/compilers/clang-gpu.py`
    and modified it as below:
```diff
$ diff clang-gpu.py clang.py

37c37
< class ClangGpu(Compiler):
---
> class Clang(Compiler):
39c39
<     cc_names = ['clang-gpu']
---
>     cc_names = ['clang']
42c42
<     cxx_names = ['clang++-gpu']
---
>     cxx_names = ['clang++']
51,52c51,52
<     link_paths = {'cc': 'clang-gpu/clang-gpu',
<                   'cxx': 'clang-gpu/clang++-gpu',
---
>     link_paths = {'cc': 'clang/clang',
>                   'cxx': 'clang/clang++',
55,56c55,56
<                   'f77': 'clang-gpu/gfortran',
<                   'fc': 'clang-gpu/gfortran'}
---
>                   'f77': 'clang/gfortran',
>                   'fc': 'clang/gfortran'}
158,159c158,159
<         if not self.is_apple or basename not in ('clang-gpu', 'clang++-gpu'):
<             return super(ClangGpu, self)._find_full_path(path)
---
>         if not self.is_apple or basename not in ('clang', 'clang++'):
>             return super(Clang, self)._find_full_path(path)
199c199
<         super(ClangGpu, self).setup_custom_environment(pkg, env)
---
>         super(Clang, self).setup_custom_environment(pkg, env)
240c240
<             bins = ['c++', 'c89', 'c99', 'cc', 'clang-gpu', 'clang++-gpu', 'cpp']
---
>             bins = ['c++', 'c89', 'c99', 'cc', 'clang', 'clang++', 'cpp']
```
4. Added lines to `~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml`
```yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: rhel7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/tcetmp/bin/clang-gpu
      cxx: /usr/tcetmp/bin/clang++-gpu
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: clang-gpu@3.8.0
    target: ppc64le
```
=========================================================
Any help would be appreciated. Thanks.
title: trying to add IBM clang-gpu on ray.llnl.gov
